a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Children per woman that survived childhood vs those that died in
The total height of the orange and purple areas shows the average number of children born per woman. The area in purple
shows the average number of children an average woman gave birth to, who died within the first five years of life.
Data source: OWID calculations based on Gapminder data
